Why BB-Imo Residence

The project was designed to offer a private and confortable environment, with a number of apartments that ensure a friendly area and using premium quality building materials, all apartments boasting a 19 sqm private balcony.

The area is very quiet, out of the city's heavy traffic way, but still close to the city center. Closeby you can find public transportation, stores, banks, restaurants and a lot of other points of interest.

  • Secure investment
  • Close to city center
  • Quiet area
  • Spacious apartments
  • 19 sqm balcony
  • Private parking
  • Premium finishes
  • Practical design
